params.owner_: owner that is allowed to call the `rescue()` function
params.usdData_: MigrationData struct with information about old and new USD pools

params.amount: Amount of old LPToken to migrate
params.minAmount: Minimum amount of new LPToken to receive

params.to: Minimum amount of new LPToken to receive
params.token: Amount of old LPToken to migrate

methods.constructor: Sets the storage variables and approves tokens to be used by the old and new swap contracts

migrateUSDPool(uint256,uint256).notice: Migrates old USD pool's LPToken to the new pool

rescue(address,address).notice: Rescues any token that may be sent to this contract accidentally.

userdoc.notice: This contract is responsible for migrating old USD pool liquidity to the new ones. Users can use this contract to remove their liquidity from the old pools and add them to the new ones with a single transaction.
